Package UI

Class Connect4GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
UI.Connect4GUI
public class Connect4GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
Author: Jesus Kana version: 001 Connect4GUI creates a GUI for Connect 4 that the user can choose to use at the start of the game. Version 001 of this code is heavily influenced by the Tic Tac Toe example. Future versions will not be.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Connect4GUI.Cell
    Inner class that is used to create, place, and check if a particular token is a winner.
